summary: Revised building for HearthFires. ( new Buildings )
descriptionHtml:
[center]


They have always wanted a beautiful home?
Then they will not want to miss this.

Â 
[size=6][u]Welcome to the new HearthFires[/u][/size]


You can use their old house. It is completely replaced by a new home.

Or simply HearthFires restart to explore everything.

step inside and feel like at home.


[size=4][i][u][b]DESCRIPTION:[/b][/u][/i][/size]

This mod is for HearthFires. There the original buildings replaced by new.
these are completely new buildings.i have adapted it to the old, as otherwise no longer matches the inventory.
the interior perfect lightning for enb

It will be replaced by the Mod Skyrim HD some textures. Who does not want, do not need to use my textures.
Just do not install.


[size=4][b][u]Requirements:[/u][/b][/size]

HearthFires

full compatible with Hearthfire


[size=4][u]Installation:[/u][/size]

unpack and Copy my Data File to Skyrim

or NMM
